content.detailedDescription:
While waiting for city bus at 127 st. john, another excited person pointed at the hill above valley street. i saw a hovering object, with red and green solid, nonflashing lights, one color on one side, one color on the other. object hovered, moved slowly side to side through a narrow arc, moved up and down a little, and maneuvered that way for about 6 minutes. its behavior seemed like a small remote piloted helicopter or drone, staying within range of its operator on the ground. we were not in a position to observe the ground under the object. finally, it descended at an angle toward the ground, and we lost sight of it behind the trees at the top of the hill.

we did not, however, hear any motor sound. also, did not have adequate references to confirm size or distance. sky was overcast, sun had just set.  

my best speculation - a hobby-sized drone with a quiet motor.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Saw small object w red light on one side and green light on other, hovering and moving

content.detailedDescription: Live by birmingham airport but never seen object like this before.It was oblong shape judging by the red light going around the object.Id say it was about at least 1000ft high and was moving slowly n.N.W.I have 2 photo's of the object
content.summary: Live by airport but never seen object like this before.It was oblong shape gudging by the red light going around the object.Id say it was about at least 1000ft high and was moving slowly nnw

content.detailedDescription: I was standing on my patio and observed a plane with a dull white light situated to the left of the aircraft just ahead of the aircraft.  the light moved exactly with the aircraft from the moment i first saw the aircraft and went out of sight behind a tree.  i immediately went on flightaware.Com and saw only jet travelling at that time in that direction. southwest airlines from phoenix, arizona to dallas, texas at approx. 6pm november 25th, 2014.
content.summary: Observed aircraft ascending with a light tracking exactly with the plane

content.detailedDescription:
My friend [name removed/cms/tg] caught an image and sent me via e-mail
he descided to keep it a secret but i'd like to open up
he stood on the balcony eagerly hunting ufos 
he believes in them and has also captured 3 or more photo of them
he said that a bright light appeared out of nowhere and at first thought it was a comet
when it came closer, he saw some unusual thing burning and crashing
the closer it came to earth, the more it vanished
he could not make out where it crashed but could capture it's image!!
content.summary: It flashed brightly and fell to the ground

content.detailedDescription:
Hallo i'm from italy and sorry for my english. i have found this site today and shipping my event of 24/04/2013. 
i was in a terrace of my last home at first plan at 9.20/30 pm with the clear sky and look arrive to far one circular light slightly elliptical for a distance.
i look this light apparently 100/200mt height.
when light is above me (100/200mt) and it's circular i look a triangular aircraft guided inside!!! from east to west, constant speed. 
times is below minute but i have a photo in my mind!!!
when i saw this object sent me tecnology, amazement, curiosity but fear also!
i understand technology unearthly!!! i haven't a time for a photo, is impossible! you look the sky and see a ufo, you can't have a camera in hand, is impossible!
i have not found this objects in no one world ufo site.

warning: i only ship drawing! - no photo!

drawing made computer! - no photo
content.summary: Circular light with triangular solid object inside with permanent lights.

content.detailedDescription: On 24 october 2014 morning 5.30am i saw a ufo in halol gujarat india postal code 389350, its looks like a star very fast moving, i was watched approx 15 seconds, same day 10miniutes before i saw a woman, but she was not woman, her eyes and mouth full of white, no eye balls found. any body want to ask details about that, pls contact my mobile no. +919898159193.
content.summary: On 24 october 2014 morning 5.30am i saw a ufo in halol gujarat india postal code 389350, its looks like a star very fast moving, i was watched approx 15 seconds, same day 10miniutes before i saw a woman, but she was not woman, her eyes and mouth full of w

content.detailedDescription: Watching tv saw object streak across view above  and disappear behind building across the street, visible for approximately 2 seconds
content.summary: Bright green shooting fireball,

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way to a movie in athens ga i was coming from winder ga. i saw beaming lights soaring at extreme speeds. my cousin and i were shocked and tried to follow the objects. they disappeared in thin air and hovered distantly from one another. they dropped 100 of feet and bounced back up and down. moved in a circular direction.
content.summary: I saw beaming light. hovering at extreme speeds . i tried following the objects but the objects disappeared in thin air

content.detailedDescription: I was in my home watching tv then i .Heard something outside so i went to see what it was i thought it was a helicopter at 1 but when i really got a look at it its no helicopter will it just stayed in one.Place for a while like it was was looking for something i was scared idk what to do now i feel like some one is watching me it just left idk how to say it i was just happy it left but now its like some one is watching me
content.summary: It was amazing i have never been more scared in my life

content.detailedDescription:
Driving northbound on i-35e between dallas and denton, tx. observed a plane ascending several miles away whose path crossed pulsating lights much closer and nearer to the ground. there were three alternating lights: one larger center light dimming while two side lights brightened.

the lights stayed in the same location as i drove by it. it was on the other side of the interstate about 1500 ft up. thought it may be a helicopter but there was no flashing tail light, no flashing lights at all. just the three lights that seemed to be on a stationary hovering object.

i felt it may have been a ufo if not a helicopter. i sought photos and footage of hovering helicopters to confirm the light arrangement and alternating pattern was not that of a helicopter.
content.summary: Alternating pulsating lights hovering over i-35e northbound by george bush turnpike, sighted driving, well below flying elevation.

content.detailedDescription: I (male age 57) drove from st. paul to st. cloud to pick up our son (age 20) from college to come home for thanksgiving. we were heading southbound on interstate 94, it was quite dark out, and when we got to about the city of big lake, we saw lots of emergency vehicles flashing on the northbound side of the freeway and as we passed by them heading southbound, we began talking about the huge traffic jam that had piled up, that was caused by the emergency vehicles, and stretched out for several miles southward involving hundreds if not thousands of cars. we were speculating on what the emergency could be and saying how glad we were that we weren't caught in it. miles later, as we approached the southern end of the traffic jam, we saw out the left side of our windshield, about 30 degrees above the horizon, a small bright white light with a huge and very bright white light right next to it which we estimated was about 500 feet in the air. i said to my son "oh look, there's a helicopter coming up from the twin cities to check out the traffic jam emergency. it's probably from one of the news stations or maybe it's one of the state patrol's bell jetranger helicopters." i said this because it looked to me like a helicopter that was shining a very bright spotlight that was coming right towards us. what struck me as odd the closer we got was that there were no red and green navigation lights shining. i would expect to see a green light on the right front side of the helicopter and a red light on the left front side of the helicopter, and a white light at the rear, as all aircraft are required to display for safe visual navigation, but there were none, just the very small white light, and the huge white light next to it. now i'm doing freeway speed, in traffic, while trying my best to glance up at this thing as often as possible. i said to my son "i wish we could pull over and take a good hard look at this thing." (and i would have, had i been on any type of road other than an interstate freeway.) as i finished saying that, the huge bright white light turned into a very small white light identical to the other small white light, so now there were only the two very small white lights side by side to each other, just hanging there in the air. as we approached it, it now was no longer seen outside our windshield, but now out my driver's window as we passed underneath. it was definitely hovering. we were directly below and slightly to it's right from my perspective. as i looked up, the two small white lights suddenly turned off and 3 small bright green lights turned on, so now i'm looking up from directly below at 3 bright green lights in a perfectly triangular pattern. my son could not see that because he was over in the passenger seat, unable to see out high enough through my driver's door window. i said "the 2 white lights just turned into 3 green lights! it's a triangle!" as i finished saying that, the southernmost green light had a flashing white strobe light appear right next to it! to give an idea of what this looked like, imagine looking up into the dark sky and seeing 3 green lights in a perfect triangle 10 feet away from each other, then imagine a white strobe appearing 1 foot from one of the green lights. this white strobe looked identical to the white strobes employed by aircraft at night. i can't explain the small/huge white light/lights. they were most definitely completely out of place and out of the norm for any known aircraft that i've ever seen! (the huge white light had looked to me like an aircraft landing light... that bright.) there were positively no red/green/white navigation lights, common to all aircraft, in their faa required locations, that i could see. the best i can simply describe this as is that it was an object with the ability to turn on or off 3 green lights in a triangle pattern, and which had the ability to turn on and off 2 small white lights and/or a large white light in front, and also the ability to turn on or off a blinking white strobe light in the rear. as a lifelong aviation enthusiast and licensed private pilot, i know airplanes inside and out, airplanes large and small, jets, helicopters, and blimps and i know what they all look like in day or night. this was like something i have never seen before. this looked like a helicopter approaching, but as we neared it, i realized it wasn't approaching but hovering. as we passed underneath, it turned off the small and big white spot lights, and turned into a green 3-lighted triangle. as we passed further underneath, the green triangle turned on a single white strobe light next to only 1 of the green lights. this was no aircraft i've ever experienced day or night. it remains to me unidentified, hence my report here now. this was an unidentified flying object hovering low above a busy city during a huge highway emergency. there must have been hundreds of witnesses to it, i'll bet many witnesses were law enforcement officers handling the freeway emergency. they couldn't have missed it! it was right over all of our heads, hovering, with an extremely bright light shining on it. the bright light did not shine down to the ground. it shone straight out ahead of the object the entire time it was turned on.
content.summary: Small white light next to huge white light, then changed to 3 green lights

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from work with my wife when we crossed the mohawk river bridge and noticed a blue green ball of light go across the evening sky leaving a small contrails behind which would disappear immediately.  i heard no noise and it took about 9 seconds for that ball of light to cross in front of us and i lost it at the tree lines.  my wife and i could not believe what we just saw.   i looked to the west from where the object had come from and saw a commercial jet flying towards us but nothing else.  it appeared to be flying level and low in the sky.  what a sight..
content.summary: Wife and i were driving over the mohawk river when a blue green ball of light streaked across the sky leavig a tiny contrail

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
in late oct of 2013, in spokane, wa. my wife and i got home around 6-ish (pm). as i got out of our vehicle, i looked upward to the sky and saw coming from the north heading south, 5 redish orange looking orb's in the sky in a zig zag like formation if you were connecting the dots. i pointed to the sky for my wife to see. they (the orb's) seemed to be pretty high up in the sky like maybe cloud level but there were no clouds near by to give me a height to compare by. the wife and i continued to look at them amazed at what they could be. then out of no where the first 3 leading orbs started to change shape into a triangle shape and hovered in a straight line path still heading south. the last two orb's seemed to have stopped somewhat but after the triangle shaped happened then the last two orbs headed south staying slightly behind until we couldn't see them anymore including the triangle. we headed inside. 

   not even 20 minutes later, i went back outside since i smoke cigarettes and my wife joined me. heading from my east side coming from the north heading south maybe about 200 to 300 ft up in the air (guessing the distance being dark outside) was a brownish object with a beige color on the shaft or what i would call a shaft in the wavy line area. heres the hard part to mention and we saw so much detail. this was a barbell shaped object about the size of almost two jet fighters put together in length and moving quickly & quietly (no sound). since we were able to view the front, side, bottom and end of this object, i can say there were no after burners on this or propeller's. it was solid but the shaft area had wavy lines & under the wavy lines was a beige - faint white color that didnt fit the main color. looked odd in other words.
content.summary: Wife and i saw 5 red-orange orbs and one huge barbell looking object heading south

content.detailedDescription:
I was finishing up an evening at a free campsite south-west of tucson, happened to look out my window just in time to see 5 or 6 large, stationary dull-orange glowing orbs floating above the mountain-line.  i immediately thought ufo, but had too short of a time to observe.  i am not sure how long they were there before i saw them. it was only a few seconds before they began to fade in sequence, one after the next, from what seemed furthest to closest, and disappeared completely from sight.  continued watching for them for 15 minutes or so and saw nothing else, but several helicopters were doing passes underneath the sighting zone for awhile afterwards.
i was very excited, but disappointed the sighting was so brief.
content.summary: A stationary string of orange orbs floating in a straight line disappeared from furthest to closest

content.detailedDescription: On february 14, 1974 at approximately 6:15 am, e.S.T. i was preparing to get ready for school, when my mother and i spotted 3 slow moving objects travelling together from west to east in the sky. the objects appeared to be "egg shaped", and were flying at about 20 degrees above the horizon. our hearts started pounding, as we had never seen anything like this before. the objects appeared to be quite large and were travelling in a fairly tight formation as they headed toward brantford, ontario, canada. i yelled for my mother to get the camera, which was a polaroid model. we both ran outside, taking the camera with her. the objects were headed towards a thick cloud bank. i pleaded with her to shoot the picture. she was working on the focus. the first object flew into the cloud bank. she did however, get a beautiful shot of the third object. in the photo, you can faintly see the second object, glowing red in the very top right-hand corner of the picture. the third object is fantastic to see! i will be including the photo in this report. i would like to add that these objects made no sound. there were no flashing lights. this sighting changed my life and has made me a solid believer that there is something more out there. i am quite well educated, and can say with certainty that this sighting was not anything man-made. the photo is now 40 years old. it has a blemish on it, however, the object itself, is in perfect viewing condition. i have kept this picture all this time, and have decided that it must now be shared with others.
content.summary: On february 14, 1974, i observed 3 glowing objects travelling together at approximately 6:15 am e.S.T. flying west to east.

content.detailedDescription: Hola, os cuento mi caso, porque seguro que alguien más lo vería... esta mañana, sobre las 7:15, en la m-111, dirección algete, en madrid, cruzó por delante de mi coche en dirección sur-norte una pequeña y rápida luz, que desapareció tras una nube. iba a baja altura, como una farola de autovía, más o menos. intrigada, busqué en el cielo a ver si veía algo, no sé qué. y fijé mi vista en una luz azul, inmóvil (supongo, pues yo sí me desplazaba con el coche), parpadeante, a una altura superior a los aviones que estaban despegando del aeropuerto cercano. me llamó la atención que iluminaba las nubes que tenía cerca.. eché un par de vistazos más arriba, pues el techo del coche me quitaba visibilidad  y descubrí que encima de esa luz, un poco más alto en el cielo, había otra igual y casi encima de mi techo una luz más potente y grande, pero blanca... las dos veces que pude mirar, éstas dos últimas parecía que seguían en el mismo sitio. la primera no se movió en la media hora que duró mi trayecto (desde mi percepción, claro. y eso incluyó m-111, a1, m40, hasta que le di la espalda). las azules estaban a mi izquierda
content.summary: 1 luz pasó rápida ante mí y desapareció tras una nube. y dos luces estáticas color azul. cerca del aeropuerto
content.locationName: San Sebastián de los Reyes, Comunidad de Madrid

content.detailedDescription:
February 2014 - 11 p.M. - i noticed nearby lights flicker on, then off, from about 15 feet away i witnessed a burning white light (sphere/orb approx. 3' diameter ) hovering 3 feet off the ground, emitting a blue horizontal fan shaped light beam that scanned an object from one end to the other then vanished thru a window-like portal that closed in a small sparkle of light.  additionally, behind the light sphere,approximately 20', there were 4-5 quarter size blue lights moving together in a string-like manner.  my impression was that the small lights were controlling the sphere's actions.  event duration approximately 1 minute.

after this event i began to look a little closer at other happenings in the area, here's a brief list of some of the things that i have noticed since the first sighting of the light sphere:

july 2014 - 9 p.M. -light sphere hovering on ko`olau mountain range across the street from residential properties.  event duration approximately 3-5 minutes.

august 2014 - present/on-going:
-unusual activity with the stars - a closer look at the stars in the area at night revealed a significant number of them weren't star at all, they appear to be various colored (red, blue, white, yellow) orb-like lights with some kind of a semitransparent halo with black dots covering them.  these false stars flash constantly red, blue, white, yellow throughout the night until pre-dawn morning.  using an $80 point and shoot camera, canon power shot sx160 is, i was able to capture over 1,000 startling pictures since august 2014.  no editing other than zoom/crop were used on any of the photos.  see attachment(s)

-just to see what i could catch, i set up a sony handycam with night shot (ir) as a monitor camera into a vcr recorder, then a dvd dv recorder, pointed it out the window and recorded throughout the night.  month's of recording has revealed extremely distressing video.  video may be submitted to a mufon investigator upon request.

september 2014 - light symbol/image projected onto multiple windows of one property which broadcasted the image onto the walls of another local property.  a blackboard was held up between the path of the sun and the windows, the image was broadcasted onto the blackboard ruling out window glass distortions. event duration approximately 2 weeks.  see attachment(s)

request for a mufon field investigator to make contact, please
content.summary: Burning white light hovering 3 feet off the ground, scanned an object, vanished thru a window-like portal. 4-5 tiny blue lights 20' behind the light orb moving in a string-like manner.

content.detailedDescription: I think that someone was joking us but in next time i saw it doing crazy things i cant described that :(
content.summary: I cant descraibed that event

content.detailedDescription: I work in downtown detroit.  i go to the waterfront daily with canada/windsor acroos the way. i take random photos of the skyline and occasionally see interesting things. that day i took several pictures and didn't check until two or 3 days later. i saw a black dot in the upper left side. to my amazement when enlarged it resembled a man like figured seated in an orb/bubble that surrounds him. its amazing!Thank you.
content.summary: Sighted man shaped entity in bubble shaped object

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking photos of a coastal scene where i live, wells harbour lifeboat station, it was an atmospheric/misty still morning, the station is 3mile approx from my garden.  i, today 25/11/14 opened my pictures and decided to zoom in on the scene, fascinated by the powerful zoom i can achieve with my modest camera,fuji finepix, i am a very amature photographer, i wanted to see if i could spot people on the beach at that distance, it is a popular walking area, holkham bay, norfolk uk, on zooming in i realised i had an unusual disc shaped object in the frame, not visible in the normal size of the photo.
i am fascinated by the scene, hence, i am reporting it to you.  i am very sceptical, i heard nothing and saw nothing at the time, it was still very silent misty day.
content.summary: I took scenic/atmospheric photos, only discovered object  3 weeks later by zooming in on subject of photograph

content.detailedDescription:
I would firstly like to express my appreciation for mufon and the work you do. it's my belief that many people see these objects in the sky and are for whatever reason, hesitant to communicate their sighting.
i was working a  night shift as a waiter in lake mary, fl. my coworker and i decided to go outside for a cigarette. at this time, it was just after sunset. the stars were coming out, it was a brilliantly clear night, and i started to point out satellites to my coworker, who has never seen them or known to look for them. it was for this reason we, at the same time, noticed a luminous flying saucer coming from the east right over the tree line. i was absolutely positive that i was seeing something i have never seen before. it flew directly (90*) over our heads and appeared to be pretty high up, but not at airplane level - traveling west northwest in a steady line going relatively slow (in my opinion). it appeared to be the size of an aspirin (if held up to compare). the light that it was giving off was more like energy than something being emitted from a bulb or beam or something like that. it was a brilliant display of comforting green and silver light, to say the least. there were patterns on the surface, the underside) that looked to be details of it's construction. from the time we saw it to the time it flew out of our vision, approximately 3-4 minutes went by. 
my emotional response to the sighting was a mix of pure happiness and falling into an existential whirlpool. i immediately hugged my coworker, whom i was not the best of friends with, and started thinking to myself how that moment in time bonds us for ever. for instance, i will never forget his name and face because this day proved to be a defining point in my belief of aliens, ufos, and coverup theories - all which i payed little attention to before this event. my sighting was special because of how clearly it was a disk flying gently through the sky. i felt happy and comfortable, like seeing this object made me feel this way. it also seemed like our thoughts could be being read or like they somehow knew we were watching them. i can't really explain in detail this feeling. 
again thank you for your time in reading my account, and i hope mufon can put a definitive link to ufos and their visitations.
content.summary: Luminous grey/green saucer seen flying over lake mary, florida

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
For the last three months several objects have been visible on clear nights, they appear to be stars at first sight but watching them for mere seconds immediately dispels that notion as they sequentially flash with varying colors and shapes of lights, from a  white diamond to an ice blue y-shape, then a red semi-circle, then an orange triangle and finally a green complete circle. most of these objects are far removed from nearby stars, often showing up in empty regions of the sky.

originally there was only one object, appearing as i was watching a plane go to the south east, the object in question appeared seemingly from nowhere and flew with incredible speed in my direction before stopping suddenly in the position in which it has remained ever since. the next night two more similar objects appeared in the southern sky and the following night an additional two appeared in the north east. around three days after the fourth and fifth objects appeared an almost blindingly bright  white orb flew silently quickly from the south east to the northwest, then again from northwest to south before apparently flying straight up and vanishing from sight.

more recently five more objects similar to the first few have appeared and flashed just like them. in addition, last tuesday night three white orbs were sighted flying parallel to each other, one above the other without any sound before disappearing after around ten minutes. shortly thereafter three more objects almost identical to the first set appeared flying in the much same manner, only flashing simultaneously before again disappearing, we have yet to see them since. while the other ten objects, which move only slightly, have remained constant, appearing shortly before the stars are visible and remaining visible until the sun rises in the morning.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Myriad of unidentified objects sighted in multiple directions

content.detailedDescription: Was doing security checks on a vehicle compound  it was a clear sunny day bright blue sky and i looked up and spotted one of the objects then as i looked around i saw the other objects it it was the way they moved that made me watch them they travelled very slowly with no noise also there was no visible markings on the objects and also i couldn't make out any sign of wings or tail after running this through my mind i decided to take a couple of pictures on my iphone 5 i carried on watching untill they were no longer visible later that night i checked the photos and used zoom to enlarge them and couldn't beleive what i saw so i felt compelled to notify someone like yourselfs to make it official
content.summary: Saw one object and stopped to observe and then spotted the others 5in total traveling together in formation

content.detailedDescription:
I ran outside to get the phone charger i had left in the car. when i turned around to come back inside i saw the object hovering directly over the house. my first instinct was to take a photo- we have strange sightings in this area all the time; my next step would have been to shoot video, but just as i snapped the photo, the orange spheres began to fade away. i knew what i was seeing was not normal, since i have lived under the direct flight path of an international airport most of my life; my time in the military, observations of nearby base activity & my work in the aerospace industry, all have me pretty well versed in commercial, private, & military aircraft, making the unusual/unidentified easy to spot. i ran inside to show my wife what i had seen, and no sooner had i handed her my phone, did we hear the military-grade chopper circling around outside. my wife sent the photos to her phone and used an app to sharpen & contrast the images which were taken without a flash. i then accompanied her outside so she could smoke a cigarette, when she saw a bright meteor streak across the sky. 

i have included both original & enhanced photos. my experience correlates closer to the enhanced version, as the object(s) were very bright.
content.summary: Went to get something from car saw it hovering right over house just as. i took picture faded away- many sightings helicopter & meteor followed within 15min

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was baking cookies with my son. i then stepped outside for a cigarette. i sat down  on my step and then noticed bright red lights in the sky. at first i thought they were planes but then quickly realized they were way to close together to be planes. i then stood up and walked to get closer to the objects to get a better look. the sky was dark. immediately i noticed 5 objects moving across the sky. they were a solid red color moving with no sound and made a strange formation in the sky. three of them then made a triangle like shape. the last of them 5 objects moved further. then on object one i noticed a grey like shape under the red solid light. the objects moved in a way that was not a plane. i immediately pulled out my phone to record th the objects.The red nights did not show up in the video as there was too much street lighting.  i remember saying out load "this is so weird". i felt scared a but but also in awe as i've never seen anything like it before. before the first object disappeared it moved down and the up rather fast. i stayed outside until all objects disappeared into the clouds.
content.summary: Saw 5 objects in the sky. solid red lights. they had an odd formation. no sound.  moved up and down before disappearing into the clouds.

content.detailedDescription: Dont really know what else to say,,it was 500 feet away from us ..It was the size of a van maybe,,no sound whatsoever,,looked as tho it was looking for something on the ground ,,but as soon as it noticed us ..It stopped dead in mid air..Hesitated thn slowly turned and landed ..No body would come with me to investiate ,,so i went myself next day..Tried to report it but..To no avail...Nobody wants nothing to do with it..Im really confused.
content.summary: Six of us saw it rise up out of the cornfield.Beside a irragation pond,,than once it seen us it turned and landed

content.detailedDescription:
At 2 pm, witness saw a ufo shooting across the sky from west to east and waved at it. when he waved at it, it turned south. witness noticed when it turned,  it was a disc shape. witness then saw a large jet chasing the ufo. when the jet was overhead he saw three large lights on the belly of the jet.
this is not the first time witness has seen ufos fly over his house and he usually waves at them and sometimes they signal back. witness has seen red and green lights on the ufos.
content.summary: Saw a light shooting accross the sky and then it turned

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my backyard and noticed (object) that was decidedly larger than any star in an easterly direction. i couldn't put it in any known flying object type. it did not offer a distinct exterior shape but suggested sphere. it changed direction 5 or 6 times, sometimes abruptly, sometimes slowly in multiple directions. during directional changes, the "aura" seemed to trail.
there were no physical or emotional responses, just curiosity. object seemed to retreat at the end as it grew dimmer and smaller.
content.summary: Glowing spheroid with a few sharp directional changes, appeared to approach and appeared to retreat rapidly

content.detailedDescription:
Walking toward druridge bay country park on the outskirts of hadston i looked across the fields toward red row i saw an orange light heading towards me.At first i thought it was just an aircraft until i realised there were no flashing navigation lights.As it got closer i got my binoculars out to have a closer look.It just looked like a cluster of orange lights but glowed like an upside down orange bowl.I observed it until it went over the trees heading to hauxley/amble.When i turned to look back across the field there was another coming from the same direction,again a cluster of orange lights no noise,this one took a slightly different path to togston.Then about a minute later i saw the 3rd craft exactly the same as other two.This followed same flight part as first.I walked across the road to the park entrance all the while watching this object.Although i had my mobile phone i never thought to video the  
objects.It was approximately 19.15 when i crossed the road.I saw a couple of dog walkers heading towards me with flashlights i asked if they had seen any strange lights and they said they had ( i didn't ask their names)
content.summary: 3 craft with orange lights following within 1 minute of each other no engine noise
